imdb.title: Bokura no
imdb.plot: In a summer vacation, a group of 15 children discovered a mysterious man living in a seashore cave, along with his high-tech gadgets. The man claimed to be a game developer creating a video game with 15 giant robots defending Eart...

episodes.title: Gêmu
episodes.plot: 15 children find a narrow cave by the sea during a summer camp. There are some working computers and electronic gadgets, and the owner Kokopeli. He introduces himself as a game programmer, and asks them to play a game what he created.

episodes.title: Ji âsu
episodes.plot: A mysterious creature like an ugly puppet Koyemshi appears in front of the children. He tells them that they can't cancel the contract, which means they can't flinch from the battles. Then, the system chooses Waku as next fighter.

episodes.title: Himitsu
episodes.plot: The police try to hear from the children as witnesses what they know about missing Waku. They hesitate to tell the truth.

episodes.title: Tsuyosa
episodes.plot: Kodama respects his father for doing anything to get what he want. He believes he and his father are worthy of being chosen. Then, the system chooses him as 2nd fighter, and teleports the children into Zearth.

episodes.title: Yowasa
episodes.plot: The children get a shock to understand the most important rule for getting on Zearth that Koyemshi revealed. Kako loses control of himself with fear. Koyemshi tempts him to ask Chizu out on a date.

episodes.title: Jôyoku
episodes.plot: The children are under the protection of the Japanese army, but Kako try to flinch away because the system chooses him as 3rd fighter. Chizu has a clue where he is.

episodes.title: Kizu
episodes.plot: Chizu accidentally killed Kako. The system chooses anyone as a substitute for 3rd fighter while Chizu remembers her memories with her family and teacher Hatagai.

episodes.title: Fukushû
episodes.plot: The enemy defeated Japanese army overpoweringly. Chizu as a substitute tries to take her revenge on Hatagai with Zearth rather than fighting.

episodes.title: Kazoku
episodes.plot: 4th fighter Daichi has sustained his younger siblings with the help of their uncle since their father abandoned them. He plans to go to an amusement park with them to make a last memory.

episodes.title: Nakama
episodes.plot: 5th fighter Nakama tries to make uniforms for the children to get over her fear.

episodes.title: Inochi
episodes.plot: 6th fighter Moji has two closest friends from childhood. One of them, Nagi has a serious heart disease. Moji found out that he is a perfectly matched donor for Nagi, so he asks Koyemshi and officer Tanaka to give his heart to Nagi after his death.

episodes.title: Chi no tsunagari
episodes.plot: 7th fighter Maki is not a child of her parents' own, but they really love her. She is looking forward to spend time with new baby brother who is born soon, but the time has come.

episodes.title: Chikyû
episodes.plot: The children, officer Tanaka and officer Seki learn where the enemy come from and what they have to fight for. The hard facts make them upset.

episodes.title: Mayoi
episodes.plot: Some countries send spies to take out the technology of Zearth, they tries to kidnap the children. Officer Tanaka makes every effort to protect them, meanwhile, officer Seki finds out her secret.

episodes.title: Jimetsu
episodes.plot: 8th fighter Kirie's family is about to destroyed. His mother tries to kill herself, so he loses his motivation to fight.

episodes.title: Chikyû
episodes.plot: Tamotsu helped Kirie's mother to find a job. Kirie relieved that she got cheerfulness again. Meanwhile, a Diet member Komoda raised a question in a Diet about Zearth according to the report that Tanaka gave him secretly.

episodes.title: Jôai
episodes.plot: Komoda got into a difficult situation. Anko's father Akira Tokosumi tries to report of Zearth on his news program, but it brings about unexpected results.

episodes.title: Genjitsu
episodes.plot: Komoda plans to talk about the Earth crisis when he announces that he'll resign his position at a press conference, however, someone tries to kill him. Officer Seki and Tamotsu support Komoda's wife and daughter to escape.

episodes.title: Haha
episodes.plot: Tamotsu brings what Tanaka bought to Ushiro and Kana. He tells Ushiro about a couple he has known well.

episodes.title: Shimei
episodes.plot: Kanji sensed an unseen presence like a ruler in a distant place when Anko passed away. Finally, Machi reveals what she knows everything.

episodes.title: Shinsô
episodes.plot: Dr. Yoshikawa continues to analyze the high technology of Zearth to release the survivors from the duty while her son Kanji protects her lab from an enemy.

episodes.title: Dôtei
episodes.plot: Koyemshi wants to make a contract with Kana because he wants to see Ushiro suffer. Ushiro goes back his foster father's place with Kana and Machi.

episodes.title: Yukigekishi
episodes.plot: Koyemshi tried to force Kana to contract with, but he was shot by Machi.

episodes.title: Monogatari
episodes.plot: Ushiro volunteers for fighting the last. He recalls his friends and his mother during the long battle.
